summary: Balrogs are powerful, demonic monsters in J.R.R. Tolkien's Middle-earth. They are tall, shrouded in fire and darkness, and armed with fiery whips. Balrogs are incredibly strong, rivaling dragons in ferocity. They were part of the evil Morgoth's forces. Tolkien created the name "Balrog," inspired by an old English word. Balrogs appear in Tolkien's books and various adaptations, like Peter Jackson's movies and video games.
title: Balrog
